posts.title: Come Lord Jesus to every thirsty heart and soul.  Jesus Christ comes in the Spirit to the Church.  Amen
posts.content:
Revelation 6:7 And when he had opened the fourth seal, I heard the voice of the fourth beast(living creature) say, Come!

Jesus Christ comes in the opening of the seals from the throne of God in each Christian soul. The throne of God is in each Christian, active and alive, the seals are opened to bring the kingdom to the Christian soul.

Revelation 6:8 And I looked, and behold a green¹ horse: and his name that sat on him was Death, and Hell followed with him.

The war horse in the 4th seal opened is green¹, green signifies life. The paradox of the rider is explained in that Jesus Christ owns death and hell. He has the key to death and hell. Jesus Christ already conquered death and hell an lives forevermore as King of kings and Lord of lords.

¹Google notes: is the pale horse green? Yes, the pale horse in the Bible is described as green in the original language

Revelation 6:8 And power was given unto them over the fourth part of the earth, to kill with sword, and with hunger, and with death, and with the beasts of the earth.

Jesus Christ comes quickly in the opening of the seals in the Christian soul. What is Jesus killing? Jesus Christ is killing the old Adamic persona, the old Adamic ways, the old Adamic doctrines, the old Adamic bondage, and all the Adamic trappings of the Christian's old life. The sword signifies the word of God, killing with starving is no longer feeding the carnal mind, killing with death is dying to the old life, killing with the beasts of the earth is every feared monster of Adamic man, Jesus Christ reigns and rules on the green war horse of life.

Come Lord Jesus.

And power was given unto them over the fourth part of the earth

Why just the fourth part? Jesus Christ brings his kingdom, an infant is born, but there is still spiritual work to be done to progress to(Revelation 11:15 And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ; and he shall reign for ever and ever.)

The Christian has been born, but they are yet carnal(see 1 Corinthians 3:3 For ye are yet carnal)

Revelation 4:1 behold, a door was opened in heaven: and the first voice which I heard was as it were of a trumpet talking with me; which said, Come up hither, and I will shew thee things which must be hereafter. 2 And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and one sat on the throne.

When Jesus Christ comes in the opening of the seals he brings life and ascension to the Christian soul.

Revelation 22:7 Behold, I come quickly: blessed is he that keepeth the sayings of the prophecy of this book.

Part of the blessing of the prophecy is the coming of Jesus Christ in the 4th seal opened in the Christian soul.

Revelation 22:12 And, behold, I come quickly; and my reward is with me, to give every man according as his work shall be.

The reward of the 4th seal opened, is ascending into life, discovering the throne, from above, like an eagle flying(see the 4th beast like an eagle)

Revelation 22:17 And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely. 20 He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

Come Lord Jesus to every thirsty heart and soul. Jesus Christ comes in the Spirit to the Church. Amen
